name: Esikidz
description: a childcare management software Project’s usage: JavaScript, React.js, React Native, node.js, REST APIs, SASS, CSS, Git, GitHub, GitLab, Trello, Jira. • Learning React.js & React Native at the enterprise level. • Specialize in developing and managing secure web and mobile apps. • Learning data science by creating apps for web crawling, data extraction, and manipulation. • Practicing various libraries for data extraction, filtration, and writing. • Experiencing AWS Lambda, S3-Bucket, MySQL, and other related technologies. • Developing multiple internal applications to support the software system in efficiently managing childcare centers.

name: Sunrise-club

name: Saskatoon Waterpaws

name: Weather app
description: A next.js application for weather update. This project uses OPENWEATHER map API to check the current weather on any city on the planet. Switch between metric and imperial units.
